Html: Is there an easy way to separate a batch file into separate batches?  I have a situation where I need to parse one file into several files based on the values in loop 2010BB.  My assumption is that I'll have to create a new interchange, as well as loop1000 and then add each loop 2000 I want to the new file.

You can use the UnbundleByX12 console to unbundle by transaction or by LoopId.

Unbundling by LoopID can be done with the UnbundleByLoop method on the X12Parser class if you don't necessary need to save them out as files.

Instructions are here:

http://x12parser.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Unbundling%20an%20X12%20file%20by%20Loop%20ID&referringTitle=Home
